wikipedia_page.main: Mary Jane Clarke (born Mary Jane Goulden; 1862– 1910), was a British suffragette. She died after being force fed whilst in prison on Christmas Day 1910 - the suffragette's "first woman martyr". She was the younger sister of suffragette Emmeline Pankhurst and she had been arrested on 23 November 1910.

response: * Mary Jane Clarke (1862–1910) –  arrested for window smashing, held in HM Prison Holloway, force-fed
